Detailed Description

Definitions for SPU-side barrier operations.

barrier reference type

Function Documentation

int ctk_barrier_init ( ctk_barrier_ea_t  barrier,
unsigned int  count 
)

Initializes the given barrier.

Parameters:
[in,out] barrier - barrier to be initialized.
[in] value - initial value for the barrier.
[in] count - the number of threads that must call ctk_barrier_wait before any of them successfully return from the call.
Returns:
CTK_SUCCESS (0) on success, errno otherwise.

void ctk_barrier_wait ( ctk_barrier_ea_t  barrier  ) 

Blocks until all the participating threads at the barrier have called ctk_barrier_wait.

Parameters:
[in] barrier - the barrier reference
